EmailTemplate.description: Email notifying WI sellers GO GREEN is Optional
EmailTemplate.name: Go Green WI
EmailTemplate.subject: Stick to sales, avoid arbitration frustration with GO GREEN ™!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for being a GO GREEN ™ member last month.
As you know, GO GREEN takes the headache out of arbitrations while increasing your wholesale profitability. By opting into the GO GREEN program, your dealership can continue to maintain a hands-off selling experience on ACV while mitigating the risk of arbitration.
As a reminder, your dealership can opt-out at any time by contacting your ACV Sales Representative or emailing WIdealers@acvauctions.com
